data.text: @Rai_Sai4 Hi, we're are rapidly expanding and adding new routes to our network. Your feedback will surely be shared. Stay tuned :) ~Linda
@luckysinghal987 You can however, please ensure to report for your connecting flight on time. Check-in counter closes 60 mins & boarding gate 25 mins prior to the departure. ~Linda
@MukeshR13954475 Mr Rajput, please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@s_dandamudi Hi, we've duly noted your feedback as an opportunity for future enhancements. ~Linda
@raihanatm Looking forward to another chance to welcome you on board. Thanks! ~Linda (2/2)

@raihanatm Hi, while we try and ensure to deliver the bags on arrival without a delay, We regret the inconvenience caused in the meantime. As checked the baggage was delivered in the intact condition and any irregularity caused is regretted. (1/2)
@TaniViya Ms Malviya, it's good to know you've received your baggage. We truly regret the hassle. Linda
@FaisalPatelPat1 Mr Patel, this is unfortunate. Did you contact our airport team upon arrival? Please DM us in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Conditions of Carriage, Passenger & Baggage | IndiGo
urls.description: For each flight booked on goIndiGo.in, there are general conditions of carriage applicable for carriage of passengers and baggage.

data.text: @mayankktrivedyy Mr Trivedi, please visit https://t.co/41P6zlw88K Clause 5.1 Point 2 for better understanding. ~Linda
@MYRJRahul07 Hi, we are ecstatic to know you've had a wonderful experience at 35000 ft! :) Your kind words of appreciation will be passed on to the entire team. #GoIndiGo ~Linda
@bhautiksheth Mr Sheth, 6E1641 will operate from Mumbai Terminal 2. ~Linda
@asitmohanty20 Mr Mohanty, sorry for the wait. Please DM us your PNR so we can share your feedback with the concerned team right away. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@I_SandeepPrasad Mr Prasad, sorry to note your experience. However, we see our Customer Care team has addressed your concern in this regard. Do let us know via DM for further assistance. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@NesarVinod Sir, we never wish to disrupt our passengers' travel plans. The delay is due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft which disrupted the rotation of the aircraft. We hope you will understand that many factors are beyond our control that determine our flight schedule. ~Linda
@mnabanita97 Ms Mandal, since the battery is non-removable it needs to be carried in cabin baggage only. ~Linda

@AlaSatyaj Therefore, we guide you to not make payments to anyone for getting a job with IndiGo. In case you are interested to apply for a position with IndiGo, you may apply on our official Careers page for a suitable position at https://t.co/hUdEntC6Js. (2/2) ~Linda

@AlaSatyaj Hi, we would want to inform you that IndiGo maintains the highest standards of ethics and integrity. IndiGo or any of its authorized agencies never request for or collect money, in the form of any kind of fees, from candidates. (1/2)
@abdulgffar33512 Yes you can Mr Gaffar. Please ensure proper packing. ~Linda
@Pravin200866 Mr Patel, we regret the inconvenience. Your feedback will be shared with the Concerned Team and you may get in touch with our Airport Team for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi
@vikramjain18 Mr Jain, could you please DM us the contact number, we'll connect with you. ~Snigdha  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@manoj_141187 Sir, we’re constantly optimizing our schedule, and we will have your feedback sent to our Route Planning Team. Keep a track of our website. ~Snigdha
@j_o_e_y_22 Sir, we regret the experience and request you to DM us your Contact Number so we get in touch with in regards to your raised concern. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Mcwell77 Thank you for the shout-out. Glad, our crew was able to assist you in the best possible way. We'll share your kudos right away! ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo
@VinayKankatte Hi Vinay, we have replied to you via DM and request you to check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@Siddhar63907909 Sir, this doesn't sound right. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can share your feedback with the concerned team to avoid such instances in the future. ~Ojasvi

@Humanity26Amit Mr Mehra, we regret the experience. The flight was delayed due to the late arrival of incoming aircraft. Rest, we request you to DM us your Contact Number so we may get in touch with you to gather more details on your experience with us. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@rachitraj1996 We regret the experience and will have your feedback shared with our Concerned Team. Looking forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi
@susvick Hi, you may carry sweets in your check-in baggage as well as cabin baggage. ~Ojasvi

@DeepakG68097623 Mr Gupta, we regret the inconvenience caused. Our flight operations are dependent on several factors, some of which are uncontrollable and may disrupt the schedule. You may DM us your PNR to check further. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@officialnafy Sir, we tried calling you multiple times, however, couldn't connect. We have added the Wheelchair under the PNR. Please DM us if further assistance is needed. Thanks.~Vaishali
@gauravb48331638 Since an RTPCR report/vaccination certificate was not produced at the time of travel, our staff asked for the same. We look forward to your understanding in this matter. ~Snigdha 2/2

@gauravb48331638 Mr Bansal, we regret to learn about your recent experience. While we try to accept all the customers booked for the flight carrying valid documents, it is also mandatory to follow the COVID guidelines of the respective destination you’re traveling to. 1/2

@GDasSurg Mr Das, we regret the experience. Please share the screenshot of error you are facing via DM along with your Contact Number so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @mikdad_zummer Hi, you may visit https://t.co/LkNT56do6a to know about the allowed/prohibited items in baggage. ~Ojasvi
@nitin84india Hi Mr Agarwal. Please let us know via DM that how may we assist you ? ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@BasilVignesh Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with your PNR and contact details via DM so we can assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@rsb7375 Sir, we regret the experience and request you to DM us your Contact Number so we may get in touch with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@abrar_ahmed909 Sir, our customer relation team has replied to your email. We sincerely regret the experience and look forward to welcoming you on board for a more favorable experience. ~Snigdha
@vaishnavir7 Ms Rao, we are all smiles to hear that. We look forward to seeing you on board more frequently. Thanks! ~Ojasvi
@AshokTak10 Sir, we are concerned to note your disappointment. We have noted the details and will check with the team & get back to you.~Vaishali

@kurinjibalaji We are thrilled to read your glowing review onboard our flight, Mr Sarangan. We take pride in our work and our sincerest hope is that it helps each one of our customers. Your feedback has demonstrated that it does, and we appreciate you letting us know. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi

@nitsbhatnagar Sir, we regret to note this. We have strict processes that ensure that only quality-checked, hygienic food is served to our customers. This seems like a lapse. We hope you had informed the crew about the same. Please DM us your PNR so we may assist.~Vaishali
@utkar7h Sir, thank you for the shoutout. We're glad to hear that our staff assisted you well. We'll definitely pass it along, please share the PNR.~Vaishali #goIndiGo

@PiyushShukla84 Mr Shukla, we understand your concern and regret the inconvenience. As checked, the flight was delayed due to Operational Reasons and is about to depart in a while. We wish you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi
@PriyankaJ1993 Hi, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @AnZaRHaRo0n Thanks for taking out the time to speak with us, Mr Haroon. As discussed, we have cancelled your PNR and the refund will be credited to your account in next 7 to 10 working days. You may also visit https://t.co/UHMZsLAMMS to check the refund status. ~Navi
@AyushiN03143136 Glad, we could assist you with this, Ma'am. ~Ojasvi

@AyushiN03143136 Ma'am, please note that IndiGo never charges any fee for selection/training from potential candidates. We request you not to make any payment for the same. You may visit https://t.co/sqVBx8d70E for the latest job opportunities. ~Ojasvi

@pkrevo26 Sir, we work hard to keep our flight clean and insect-free, hope you'll understand insects or mosquitoes cannot be completely guarded against and we can't fumigate when passengers are on board. However, we have well noted your feedback. ~Vaishali

@ssbharat Thanks for the #Shoutout, Sir. We request you to share your PNR via DM so we may have your feedback shared with our Concerned Team. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@AbhijithMenon19 Sir, we’re constantly optimizing our schedule, and we will have your feedback sent to our Route Planning Team. Keep a track of our website.~Vaishali

urls.title: Non-standard & Special Baggage Assistance - IndiGo
urls.description: Get support and read frequently asked questions if you carry an over-sized or odd-sized item. Know what items considered as special baggage, at goIndiGo.in.

data.text: @Veer58682419 Hi, please visit https://t.co/IloC6BLszs to get detailed info on the same. Thanks.~Vaishali
@vivekrastogi Mr Rastogi, thank you for your appreciation. We are glad to know our staff could assist you well. We'll surely pass on your kudos to our team right away. ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo
@mageshmagi Hi, we regret the inconvenience. Please DM us your PNR so we can check and assist you at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

@Bhupind38129625 Hi, thank you for your kind words. We are glad to know that our team was helpful in ensuring a hassle-free experience. Please DM us the PNR, we will surely pass on your word of thanks to our team members. ~Ojasvi #GoIndiGo

@RomanDas1 We are concerned to know this. Rude behavior is not at all accepted. Please share your PNR and details via DM so we may share the feedback with the relevant department for review and necessary staff briefing to avoid such instances in the future.~Vaishali
@sidhi0011 Sir, could your please DM us your Contact Number and experience in more detail so we may check on the same? Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@sidhi0011 Hi, this concerns us. We'd like to look into this right away. Please help us with your PNR so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi

@keshri95 Sir, we regret the experience. We hope you are fine now. Please share your PNR via DM so we may share the feedback with the concerned team for review and action. Looking forward to serving you better in the future.~Vaishali

urls.title: Flight Status - Flight tracker, Check live departure & arrival time | IndiGo
urls.description: Track live flight status for departure and arrival time. Enter your flight pnr or booking details to know the updated flight status and plan your travel accordingly.

data.text: @lkohospital24hr Sir, as of now, there are no changes in the flight schedule. Please stay tuned to https://t.co/VhykW6WLqz to keep a track of flight status. ~Ojasvi
@nebulaekoo Sir, please know that a refund has been initiated under the PNR to the original form of payment on14th Oct 22. Please connect with your travel agent for further assistance.~Vaishali
@manogyaloiwal Be rest assured, your feedback is noted for a closer review. ~Prabh  2/2

@manogyaloiwal Ma’am, thank you for your time over the phone and allowing us to address the issue. While we regret the delay in baggage arrival, it was due to multiple arrivals at the same time and non-availability of belts that caused congestion. 1/2

urls.title: Senior Citizen Discount - Get Discount on the Base Fare | IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offer a great deal for senior citizens with a concession of upto 6% off on base fare. Applicable for citizens above the age of 60 years.

data.text: @devendraraigkp Sir, yes they can. Please visit https://t.co/RPR8NKMxdw to know about senior citizen discounts. ~Ojasvi
@Sangha25Das Ms Das, please check we have your DM we have replied you. ~Diyashi

@rigvedh Sir, we regret the experience. Rude behavior is not at all acceptable and we'll have your feedback shared with our Concerned Team to avoid re-occurrence. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi
@Bhargav94210976 Hello, we believe your concern was addresses by one of our team members. Do let us know for further assistance. ~Diyashi
@Varshaluu Hi, it's not mandatory to carry the Hard Copy of Health Declaration Form. ~Navi
@snnadkar20gmail Mr Nadkar, we see our Customer Relations Team is already working on your case and will get back to you soon with an update. We request your patience on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

@vivekrastogi Hello, we regret the inconvenience, we always try to fly on time, but as checked due to the delay in the incoming flight the outgoing flight got delayed. Please know that our team is serving refreshments and will connect with you shortly. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@nikhilpghag Mr Ghag, we regret the inconvenience and will have your feedback shared with our Concerned Teams. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi
@the_cool_1_ You're most welcome. Looking forward to having you onboard soon again. ~Navi

@MdTousifHussai1 Mr Hussain, our Airport Team is trying their best to reunite you with your baggage. Please allow us some time to get back to you with an update. You may also DM us for further communication on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@mohamed39175159 Hello, you can carry electric kettle in you checked in baggage and not hand baggage. ~Diyashi

@vrv836 Sir, it's never our wish to cancel the flights and disrupt your travel plans. But if we do, we provide plan B with alternate flight or full refund options. You may DM the PNR for us to check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@marathe_amar Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the contact number so we may connect. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Rdcoolgarg143 We regret the delayed response.  We raising the issue with the concerned team. They will connect with you shortly. ~Diyashi

@rachitraj1996 Sir, we're sad to see this but we work really hard to keep things spic and span. Did you reach out to our crew about this? We'll highlight this to the concerned team for necessary measures. ~Shreya
@Pramod15968977 Sir, we've replied to your DM. Please check. ~Shreya
@sudharao3 Ma'am, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@6d2ed24510e0473 We regret the loss. You may check with the airport's lost and found department. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@Thesuryaman Sir, as checked the flights are on time. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @hivikash23 Mr Kumar, we regret the inconvenience caused to you. We never intended to provide such an experience. You may opt for Plan B clicking on https://t.co/bBjWkPN9uM. Please let us know for further assistance. ~Diyashi

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @ImAhmedTufail Sir, as checked, Air suvidha is required to be filled when travelling from Jeddah to Delhi. ~Diyashi
@selvaraj_akhil Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@yadavmayank Yes, you can carry it in cabin baggage. Thanks! ~Shreya

@Democrat110 Sir, it is not mandatory to buy a seat. If you do not wish to pay for the seat, while doing the web check-in, please click on the 'auto-assign' option which is available till 6 hours prior to the departure and a seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Shreya
@Sreejith_V_K Yes, you may carry power bank in cabin baggage. ~Shreya

@Jayanta00876124 Hi! Sorry to disrupt your travel. There is an unexpected delay due to a technical issue and we had to change the aircraft. Please be rest assured that the flight will depart after every security measures are followed and go-ahead is given. ~Shreya

entity.name: Food & Beverage Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent and related to foods & beverages such as snacks, soft drinks, beers.

data.text: @magarmach_ Hello, we are afraid that this can be booked now as meals have to be pre-booked 24 hrs before the departure. You may check with our crew on board to know about the availability.. ~Diyashi.

@tinucherian Thank you for meeting us, Mr Abraham. While we regret the inconvenience caused, we hope that we were able to explain the charges incurred. Looking forward to having you on board soon. ~Prabh

data.text: @pherwani @aajtak @ndtv @PMOIndia @OfficialDGISPR Hello, we are glad to serve you. Thank you for the shout-out. We shall pass on the appreciation to the concerned person. ~Diyashi
@Charu_doc Ma'am, we're sorry for the delay and appreciate your understanding. ~Shreya

@Sanjibks01 Mr Sinha,  we regret to see this but we work really hard to keep things spic and span. Did you reach out to our crew about this? Could you please DM us your PNR so we may highlight this to the concerned team. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: FAQs About Travel Documents - IndiGo
urls.description: Which all documents are accepted? Get help with travel documents related queries from the listed frequently asked questions. Learn more at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @luckysinghal987 Sir, please visit our website https://t.co/CdJwfQUyJt . ~Shreya
@anujkabra85 Sir, please visit https://t.co/Smh6msLNhW for group booking. You might as well write to us at groups@goindigo.in for any queries. ~Shreya
@drchinmoydas Sir, thank you for the shoutout.
@NavalSingh_ Sir, thank you for the shoutout. We're glad to hear that our staff assisted you well. We'll definitely pass it along, please DM the PNR.~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@SarojKansabani1 Sir, please know that our check-in baggage allowance is 15 kgs and anything above the allowed baggage will incur charges. Thank you for your understanding. ~Diyashi
@akshaydho81 Sir,  we apologise for the delay. The flight is delayed due to operational reasons. Our team is trying to get you in the air as soon as possible. Please hang in there. ~Shreya
